content.body: Back in the day, W3C had three divisions of the DOM spec. One was core DOM, the other was HTML DOM and the third was XML DOM. But when I go to the WHATWG spec, there is no mention of this distinction. My point is, that is this distinction still made in the specs of the DOM or can we now safely assume that there is no such distinction and that there is just one DOM spec.
